content:
That sounds like a great plan! Using Strava's route builder to plan a 20-mile route that explores scenic roads around your hometown is a wonderful way to discover new areas and enjoy the local scenery. By using the elevation profile, you can ensure that your route is comfortable and enjoyable, without any surprises.

Adding waypoints to mark interesting landmarks or scenic views is a fantastic idea. This will not only help you remember the route but also give you something to look forward to along the way. You might even discover some hidden gems or unexpected surprises!

Remember to take your time, enjoy the ride, and soak up the scenery. Don't hesitate to stop and take photos or appreciate the views whenever you want. And if you need any more tips or advice, feel free to ask.

As you plan your route, I'll be here, virtually cheering you on and looking forward to hearing about your adventure! Have fun planning, and I hope you have an amazing ride!
